title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 70: Featuring Paul Bissonnette
description:
Our buddy Biz joins us for the entire episode this week and delivers per usual. We discuss Ovechkin's 600th goal, the way goal scorers have evolved, Whits mushing Hallsy on last week's ep, possible playoffs expansion, Andrew Shaw KOing himself on a hit, Whits making a cameo in the Minnesota Hockey Hair video, self-censoring/self-awareness on podcasts, 400 wins for Marc-Andre Fleury, and playing out the string on a non-playoff team. Also, Biz brings up relationship advice and the boys end up taking a funny detour from the puck chatter for a bit to dole out some "wisdom".Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
